scripts.compile-node: docker run -e DEBUG=1 --name=emcc -t blech32-js emcc src/blech32.c -o src/blech32.js -O3 -s WASM=0 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap", "getValue", "setValue", "allocate", "intArrayFromString", "ALLOC_NORMAL"]' -s EXPORT_ALL=1 -s LINKABLE=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s ENVIRONMENT='node' --memory-init-file 0 && docker cp emcc:/src/src/blech32.js ./src/blech32.js && docker rm emcc
scripts.compile-web: docker run -e DEBUG=1 --name=emcc -t blech32-js emcc src/blech32.c -o src/blech32.js -O3 -s WASM=0 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap", "getValue", "setValue", "allocate", "intArrayFromString", "ALLOC_NORMAL"]' -s EXPORT_ALL=1 -s LINKABLE=1 -s NO_EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -s ENVIRONMENT='web' --memory-init-file 0 && docker cp emcc:/src/src/blech32.js ./src/blech32.web.js && docker rm emcc
scripts.test: npm run format:ci && npm run lint && npm run unit
